title: Design Thinking-Based Practical Problem-Solving Process in Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific theories and professional practical experience in the field
context.additional_context: Process where current professionals (medical/legal/technical) apply design thinking methodologies to scientific problem-solving, conducted through team-based collaboration and case analysis in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can systematically solve real-world science problems using the five-stage design thinking process
Learners can derive creative solutions through team collaboration and develop prototypes applicable in practical settings
Learners can improve problem-solving competencies by at least 20% through iterative feedback processes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
